exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R Hlim : is_lim_seq u 0 P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Rbar_abs ?M2368 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball 0 eps y -> P y".

In environment H : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) (Rbar_abs l) u : nat -> R Hlim : is_lim_seq u 0 Unable to unify "is_lim_seq u 0" with "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) 0".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment u : nat -> R Hlim_abs : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) 0 Unable to unify "match ?M2801 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ l - eps < ?M2800 n) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> ?M2800 n < l + eps) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ M < ?M2800 n | m_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> ?M2800 n < M end" with "forall eps : posreal, eventually (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n - 0) < eps)".

In environment H0 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) (Rbar_abs l) H : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq u l u : nat -> R Hlim_abs : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) 0 eps : posreal Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Rbar_abs ?M3019) P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => Rabs (?M3018 n)) eventually P" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun n0 : nat => Rabs (u n0 - 0) < eps) n".

In environment H2 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) (Rbar_abs l) H1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq u l u : nat -> R Hlim_abs : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) 0 eps : posreal Unable to unify "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) 0" with "eventually (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n - 0) < eps)".

original: intros u. split. - intros Hlim. apply is_lim_seq_abs. apply Hlim. - intros Hlim_abs. apply is_lim_seq_spec. apply is_lim_LimSup_seq. apply is_lim_seq_abs. apply Hlim_abs.
